ygData.subject: Re: Massive Changes to Trade System?
ygData.msgSnippet: The tip I heard is they were changing them to NOT suck, making them harder to learn would have the opposite effect, making you able to sell armor to the shops
ygData.messageBody:
The tip I heard is they were changing them to NOT suck, making them harder
to learn would have the opposite effect, making you able to sell armor to
the shops for about twice the cost of making it (and therefore driving the
cost at which smiths sell to players up to at least that oint) would be
helpful.
----- Original Message -----
From: Jason Coan <COANJ@...>
To: <EQ_Blacksmiths@onelist.com>
Sent: Monday, May 17, 1999 11:04 AM
Subject: Re: [EQ_Blacksmiths] Massive Changes to Trade System?


> From: "Jason Coan" <COANJ@...>
>
> Then again, they may make trade skills harder to learn....
>
> >>> "Ed Coyle" <ecoyle@...> 5.17.99 12:23:39 PM >>>
> From: "Ed Coyle" <ecoyle@...>
>
> I saw this post on Stratics this morning:
>
> A massive revision to trade skills and the manners in which
> they function will be implemented through an important patch
> to be released approximately 2 months from now.
>
> Does anyone know what they are planning? Any rumors?
>
> My Blacksmith skill is right around 24 right now, and I am not sure if I
> should develop it any further, spending a ton of plat, if they plan on
> changing the system drastically.
>
> Etuen - 18th Wizard
>
>
